duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and qualify prospects, navigate company structures, and engage decision-makers
Generate appointments through proactive outbound prospecting using various outreach mechanisms
Work closely with the Field Marketing team to identify and build a strategy for event engagement and sessions
Manage relationships with CXOs and top executives at various events, demonstrating Whatfix capabilities and creating qualified opportunities
Serve as a brand ambassador for Whatfix at physical and virtual events, engage attendees in meaningful conversations, and qualify leads to identify promising opportunities
Coordinate with the remote team in India to streamline lead management and ensure efficient coordination

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or related field
